title: NG Bolivia 2018
description: The biggest Angular conference in Bolivia carefully crafted for you and by Angular community! All about Angular and Web from the world experts
keywords: angular, conference, event, community, gde, google, programming, developers, web, typescript, mobile, cloud
whySubscribe: Subscribe to be the first to know about the Conference. Follow us on Twitter: @angularBolivia
subscribeNote: No spam, only the latest news and updates!
ticketsDetails: Conference ticket grant access to all conference talks and coffee breaks. A Workshop ticket grant access to single workshop(See our schedule for more details). Accommodation is NOT included in the ticket price.
socialMotto: Add to circles, like, follow or connect with us on
clickToViewPhotos: Click here to view more photos
locationDescription: We are in the square of Cala Cala, one of the best areas of Cochabamba city.
aboutOrganizers: Angular Bolivia with support of more than 700 members is proud organizer of NG-Bolivia conference.
aboutGdg: Angular Bolivia - is an open geek community who share experiences about Angular and Web technologies with passion.
teamPageText:
Google is known all around the world. Everyone is 'googling', checking on 'maps' and communicating in 'gmail'. For simple users, they are services that just works, but not for us. Developers see much more: APIs, scalability issues, complex technology stacks. And that is what GDG is about.

[Google Developers Group (GDG) Lviv](http://lviv.gdg.org.ua/) - is open and volunteer geek community who create exciting projects and share experience about Google technologies with a passion.

Our goal is to organize space to connect the best industry experts with Ukrainian audience to boost development of IT.
